sqlMap.select:
select a.REC_ID, a.APPLY_ID, b.RECORD_TYPE, c.DEPTID, c.DEPTNAME, b.GROUP_ID, (select group_name from adc_shift_group where group_id=b.group_id) as group_name, b.EMPID, (select name from employee where empid=b.empid) as empname, b.PATTERN_ID, (select pattern_shift_name from adc_shift_pattern where pattern_id=b.pattern_id) as pattern_shift_name, a.INIT_DATE, a.INIT_POSITION, b.priority, a.OPERATOR, (select username from eauser where userid=a.operator) as operator_name, a.OPERATE_TIME, a.HOLIABLE from Adc_Shift_Record a, adc_shift_apply b, eadept c where a.APPLY_ID=b.APPLY_ID and b.deptid=c.deptid
c.cascadeid like '$cascadeid$%'

select count(*) as count from Adc_Shift_Record a, adc_shift_apply b, eadept c where a.APPLY_ID=b.APPLY_ID and b.deptid=c.deptid
c.cascadeid like '$cascadeid$%'
sqlMap.insert: insert into Adc_Shift_Record (APPLY_ID, INIT_DATE, INIT_POSITION, OPERATOR, OPERATE_TIME, HOLIABLE) values(#apply_id#, #init_date#, #init_position#, #operator#, #operate_time#, #holiable#)
sqlMap.update:
update Adc_Shift_Record
rec_id = #rec_id#
apply_id = #apply_id#
init_date = #init_date#
init_position = #init_position#
operator = #operator#
operate_time = #operate_time#
HOLIABLE = #holiable#
where rec_id = #rec_id#
sqlMap.select:
select a.id, a.rq, a.rec_id, c.deptid, hr_getfulldeptname(c.deptid) as deptname, c.GROUP_ID, (select group_name from adc_shift_group where group_id=c.group_id) as group_name, c.EMPID, (select NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPID=c.empid) as empname, c.PATTERN_ID, (select PATTERN_SHIFT_NAME from adc_shift_pattern where PATTERN_ID=c.pattern_id) as PATTERN_NAME, a.begin_time, a.end_time, a.state, a.memo from adc_shift_record_logs a, adc_shift_record b, adc_shift_apply c, eadept d where a.rec_id=b.REC_ID and b.APPLY_ID=c.APPLY_ID and c.deptid=d.deptid
d.cascadeid like '$cascadeid$%'
a.rq >= #start_date#
a.rq <= #end_date#

select count(*) as count from adc_shift_record_logs a, adc_shift_record b, adc_shift_apply c, eadept d where a.rec_id=b.REC_ID and b.APPLY_ID=c.APPLY_ID and c.deptid=d.deptid
d.cascadeid like '$cascadeid$%'
a.rq >= #start_date#
a.rq <= #end_date#
